name: Markerly, Inc.
description: Operator of an influencer marketing platform designed to connect brands with people. The company's platform helps to build a marketing network with full campaign management capabilities and influencer CRM (Customer Relationship Management) tools, enabling clients to create authentic experiences and persuasive repurposable content.
